original_text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 죽은 자들에게도 복음이 전파되었으니 이는 육체로는 사람으로 심판을 받으나 영으로는 하나님을 따라 살게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: was the gospel preached also to them that are dead
that they might be judged according to men in the flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 육체로는 사람처럼 심판을 받으려 함이라

sentences.original_text: but live according to God in the spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 영으로는 하나님께 따라 살게 하려 함이라
